paper_abstract: The finite element method is already used in metal forming at an industrial scale. However, progress is needed regarding the microstructure optimization of components produced by metal-forming processes such as hot forging or rolling. This article presents mathematical models to predict microstructure evolution during hot working, showing the models' application coupled to thermomechanical processes' simulation software.
paper_title: Numerical Simulation of Thermomechanical Processes Coupled with Microstructure Evolution
